sentences.text: hi, Cole.
Good morning.
Hey.
What's going on huseni, how are you?
Good, good.
How are you?
I'm good.
I appreciate you hopping on the call here today.
Yeah, yeah, thank you.
Just.
To set a quick agenda, you know, we'd love to do a quick round of introductions, understand your role.
What got you interested in hiver?
Then we can jump into a product demonstration, and then we'll just save some time at the end for any questions at next steps.
Yes, sure.
Sure.
So, I'm working as a freelancer for Lucinda green XC academy.
So it's an online sports academy where we sell courses with the name of Lucinda green.
She is one of the greatest cross country horse rider.
So basically, we are running this after post covid and it's been around for five years and we have around 1,000 members on board and we sell other products courses in between.
So we basically use Gmail for the support system, the email part.
But, and we were missing some of the emails because of like there was the customers, lot of queries kept on coming about the courses, then some part on the cancellation, some tech issues, etc.
So we were using helpdesk from last six to eight months, I believe.
But we were exploring a better tool.
If we can have like on helpdesk, what is happening is our emails are getting forwarded to the helpdesk, and we don't have those in our inboxes those emails.
So now we wanted to leverage gemini or some other ais who sits directly on our inboxes.
And if we get some tool which can help us just organize the tickets, like which are the, what are the queries?
Etc?
So we can resolve it quickly.
And I think like there will be easy redrafting using an AI.
So all those features we are exploring.
Got it.
So, is it like a general mailbox that people are reaching out to that you want to manage better?
Or what does that look like today?
Yeah.
So we have two Gmail accounts on those like we, one is for the members exclusively where all the members reach out and one is in a general email inbox.
Where people reach out for general queries.
Okay.
And how many people are working through those email communications?
Generally, one or two at a time?
Yeah.
One or two people total on these customers.
So it's.
not a big team.
Yeah, but we are scaling and if we add another clients then I think we will have more inboxes to manage.
And we will have to add people.
Got it.
So taking a look at my screen here, you know, huseni, what's nice about hiver is, you know, we are a certified Google partner.
You know, you'll log in to hiver with your normal Google account.
And then on the left hand side, you're going to have your personal inbox, you know, your normal Gmail view and then those shared inboxes below as an organization.
So think customer success, shared mailbox, finance, shared mailbox, healthcare, I'm going to click into the finance one here and it opens up some sub views to help manage the intake.
So the first one assigned new emails that have hit the mailbox that need to be delegated, the next is mine, everything that's been assigned to me.
And then there's the team view.
So understanding, you know, what are both of those people currently working on?
What's outstanding and what needs to be completed?
Want to pause here?
Any questions so far?
No, no.
You can go ahead.
Like only thing is we don't have a bigger team.
So like based on our requirement, if you can give me a like how we can use it, your tool yep.
So, first couple things, right?
We can assign a conversation.
In this case, I'm going to assign to myself and the team.
Now, I'm going to follow up.

We can then track the status whether it's open pending or closed, ensuring no emails slip between the cracks, and that we're working through these conversations to a resolution… adding tags for organizational purposes.
You said you want the ability to organize well, this is where you're going to be able to do that by leveraging these tags to send the conversations to specific buckets folders or views.
And then we can also leverage these tags to trigger automations.
And we can also provide analytics on the back end with these tags to understand why are people reaching out?
What are the hot topics or trends we're facing amongst the team?
Okay.
So how will you be doing this tagging?
Like it's all these departments or like issues you have categorized here?
Yeah.
So it can be done either via automations by creating rule based automations, where it's like new conversation comes in with billing in the subject line.
Let's automatically apply the tag billing.
But then we also have an AI mechanism on our top tier plan in our elite package which allows you to automatically categorize these leveraging AI.
So understanding the intent through AI analysis and then adding the tag based on what the prompt thinks.
Okay.
Got it.
And.
Then the last couple of things here, right?
Are the collaboration aspects.
So being able to collaborate internally… I'll send this notification to Jeevan, he'll receive that notification up top.
He can then click on it.
It'll take him right to this thread where we can keep having this back and forth conversation in the notes section.
And then we have that ability to leverage our AI co pilot to draft replies.
And this actually leverages your data sources, your information to search through to draft a reply more efficiently and effectively.
Okay.
So this will like we'll look at how we are responding earlier.
And based on those, our… previous replies, it will draft or we'll have to train this or, yeah.
So it's a combination of it'll, be trained and also, you can feed it information to draft responses.
